name: Pterodactyl Attack
description:
This is our first commercially published game. It is not a great game, nor one of the best, but it occupies a special place in our trajectory as game developers. Although simple, we hope you can have fun with it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Narrative 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rex, a young Tyrannosaurus that had his life completely changed thanks to the great volcanic eruptions. Rex is hungry and needs to eat, but his only alternative is to feed on pterodactyl eggs. Despite eating, the eggs are not enough to satisfy Rex's hunger. The more he eats, the hungrier he feels. It is an endless cycle in search of survival.

Help Rex escape the deadly attack of Pterodactyls. Jump from one platform to another; Vivid and colorful HD graphics; Collect Pterodactyl Eggs as prizes!
